item.title: Juan Florez
item.content:encoded:
About me

Hi, I'm Juan Florez, a technical artist living and working in Berlin, Germany. I am focused in the use of Houdini as a tool for streamlining game development.

I studied Visual Game and Media Design (M.Des.) at The Royal Danish Academy, School of Design, in Copenhagen, Denmark. and have a bachelor of Fine Arts (B.A.) from Los Andes University in Bogota, Colombia.

Please contact me at: juancahf@proton.me
item.author: Juan
